name: Daemon Survivor
description:
Daemon Survivor is a roguelike survival game made for the UNCC game jam.

It is heavily influenced by several other roguelikes the most prominent being Rogue Survivor.

Controls are...

Move: Numpad

Grab: G

Drop: D

Use Item: 0-9

Run: R

Look at item: X

Save: S

https://github.com/LightBoat9/UNCCGameJam2020
